Class AreaSelector

Select a coordinate (X and Y value) by clicking on an area.

Methods

CalculateAreaAngles()

Calculate the angles of the main area's minimum and maximum points. If foreground image exists, calculate the angles for it as well.

Declaration
public virtual void CalculateAreaAngles()

ClickedInsideArea()

Get the coordinate ratios, place a pointer object to the correct position and send an Action with ratios.

Declaration
protected virtual void ClickedInsideArea()

ClickEnded()

End the current click and invoke OnClick. Calculate the click coordinates after that and send an Action with coordinate information.

GetClickCoordinates()

Calculate the position of the click, defined as a ratio between 0...1 on X and Y axii. This ratio is the point inside backgroundImg.

Declaration
protected virtual Vector2 GetClickCoordinates()
Returns
Type Description
UnityEngine.Vector2

Vector2 of ratios between 0...1.
